about.title: A Legacy of Italian Culinary Excellence Since 1971
about.subtitle: Founded by Franco Di Menna, our restaurant has transformed from a humble pizzeria into one of Montréal's most cherished Italian dining destinations.
features: Authentic Italian recipes passed down through generations
Premium local ingredients harmoniously paired with Italy's finest imported specialties

From our modest beginnings as a neighborhood pizzeria to our current standing as a distinguished restaurant, we've preserved our dedication to quality and tradition while embracing culinary innovation.
about.description: Nestled at 6313 Jarry Street East in Saint-Léonard, Di Menna has evolved into a beloved culinary institution within our community. Our menu showcases traditional antipasti, artisanal pasta, Montreal's finest pizzas, and authentic Italian desserts. In 2016, we transformed our dining room and introduced an elegant bar featuring signature cocktails and premium Italian beers, elevating the gastronomic experience while preserving the warm, family atmosphere that has made us a cherished neighborhood destination for over five decades.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyUs.subtitle: The Di Menna Difference

reasons.title: Family Tradition
reasons.content: Established in 1971 by Franco Di Menna, our restaurant carefully preserves authentic Italian recipes passed down through generations, bringing the genuine essence of Italy to Montréal for over 50 years.

reasons.title: Premium Ingredients
reasons.content: We meticulously import the finest ingredients directly from Italy and source the freshest local produce daily, ensuring each dish delivers extraordinary flavor and authenticity that exemplifies true Italian culinary mastery.

reasons.title: Unique Experience
reasons.content: From our wood-fired pizzas to our handcrafted pasta and exquisite desserts, every visit to Di Menna offers an authentic culinary journey through Italy's diverse regional traditions in a warm, inviting atmosphere.

whyUs.quote: At Di Menna, we don't simply serve food; we share our heritage, passion, and the authentic joy of Italian cuisine with every dish we lovingly prepare.

chefs.subtitle: The Soul of Our Culinary Artistry
chefs.name: Concezio Di Menna
chefs.bio: Concezio Di Menna passionately continues the family legacy as executive chef of Restaurant Di Menna, gracefully positioned at 6313 Jarry East in Montreal. Founded in 1971 by Franco Di Menna, the restaurant has earned recognition for its exceptional Italian cuisine and authentically warm, welcoming atmosphere.
chefs.quote: Cooking is the art of blending heart with tradition, a precious heritage passed down from generation to generation.
achievements: Executive Chef and Guardian of Traditions at Restaurant Di Menna
